title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 426.8 - Assignment of support rights
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 426.8 - Assignment of support rights

State Regulations
(a) Approved applications for foster care
maintenance payments which are reimbursable pursuant to title IV-E of the

Social Security Act constitute an assignment to the State and the social
services district concerned, of any rights to support from any other person as
such applicant may have in his or her own behalf. Such approved applications
must be referred to the child support enforcement unit of the social services
district for appropriate action in accordance with the requirements of Part 422
of this Title. (b) Any income or
resources collected as child support for a child or children of a minor parent
in foster care or in an adoptive placement for whom the costs of care are
provided through the title IV-E foster care maintenance payments or adoption
assistance payments of the minor parent must be disregarded. Such child support
does not constitute an assignment to the State or the social services
district. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
426.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
